author: Anonymous Poet
title: Skipping over a condition
question:
Can somebody please tell me what function to use to do something like this: *check if the input is a string, if it is, move to the next condition* 

I've tried using (string? (<my condition>)) but I get an error saying "string=?: expects a string, given <a number>", meaning that the function didn't skip over that condition...
Thanks!
student_answer:
Careful that 
(string=? x y)
and
(string? x)
are different. For instance, the first consumes 2 arguments and the second only consumes 1 (I'd search them up on Racket help desk if you still need more info)
